title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Cognitive Load Management Using Collaboration-Driven Flipped Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can structure and explain mathematical problem-solving processes in three stages (analysis-planning-execution) in collaborative flipped learning environments
Learners maintain class participation by completing pre-learning materials of 15-minute segments twice weekly with over 80% completion rates through mobile microlearning
Learners solve complex mathematical problems by applying at least two cognitive load reduction strategies (e.g., chunking, visualization) in peer feedback-based group discussions

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
